entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
